comment._content: Hi, this photo has been discussed in one of the threads in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool!

comment._content: This photograph is part of the Indicommons.org then-and-now feature Mount Fuji, because it's that awesome!

comment.author: 44836839@N02
comment._content:
That snow looks beautiful but is scary up close. Probably global weather changes caught me on Fuji with heavy unseasonal snow in late June, 2009. See a picture
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/subhasis_banerji_visions/4121492085/in/set-72157622723207767/] 
Our patience was rewarded by a crystal clear sunrise at the summit
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/subhasis_banerji_visions/4122265588/in/set-72157622723207767/]
